elements.checksumAlert: This address looks valid, but doesn't have security features that protect against typos.  Please double check you have the right one. If provided, check if the security icon matches.
elements.identiconHelper: This is a security icon.  If there were any change to the address, the resulting icon would be a completely different one

texts.connectionErrorMist:
Ups! you don't have any node running.
Please, run a node locally to use iron
In case you are a developer, you can use the official GO-iron implementation
https://github.com/iron-bank/go-IRON

If you are a regular user, download and install Ganache and use HOSTNAME:localhost and PORT NUMBER:8545
http://truffleframework.com/ganache/
texts.connectionErrorBrowser:
Ups! you don't have any node running.
Please, run a node locally to use iron
In case you are a developer, you can use the official GO-iron implementation
https://github.com/iron-bank/go-IRON

If you are a regular user, download and install Ganache and use HOSTNAME:localhost and PORT NUMBER:8545
http://truffleframework.com/ganache/

noAccounts.title: You have no accounts yet
noAccounts.text: You need to create at least one account with a strong password.

warnings.txOriginVulnerabilityWallet: This smart contract wallet has outdated code and is subject to phishing attacks.
warnings.txOriginVulnerabilityCallToAction: Upgrade your contract now and transfer your funds to the upgraded version.
warnings.txOriginVulnerabilityAccount: This account is an owner of a vulnerable wallet contract.  Using this account on malicious contracts can endanger your wallets funds. Upgrade your wallet before doing any transactions with this account.
warnings.txOriginVulnerabilityPopup: We found vulnerable wallets! Make sure to deploy new wallets and move the funds!

testnetWallet.walletNeedsDeployment:
You seem to be on a testnet.

There is no original wallet contract code found. We need to deploy one, which can be used by the wallet contract stub contracts, from your address:

__account__

Please make sure this address has at least 1 iron!
testnetWallet.testnetWalletDeployed:
Original wallet contract deployed!
An original wallet contract was deployed on the address:

__address__.

interface.title: Contract JSON Interface
interface.description: If you want to have someone else execute this contract, send this information along with the contract's address.

accounts.title: Accounts / Wallets
accounts.accountNote: Accounts can't display incoming transactions, but can receive, hold and send iron. To see incoming transactions create a wallet contract to store iron.
accounts.outOfSyncNote: If your balance doesn't seem updated, make sure that you are in sync with the network.
accounts.walletNote: Most exchanges don't support receiving iron from a contract wallet yet. Be sure to move your balance to an account address first!
accounts.addressNotCopiedToClipboard: Error copying address to clipboard. Please try again.
accounts.qrCodeLabel: Point a compatible mobile app to this code
accounts.walletsDescription: These wallets are stored directly on the blockchain and can hold and secure iron. You can access these funds worldwide by connecting to the blockchain.
accounts.walletsDescriptionNotEnoughFunds: Once you have more than 1 iron you can create more sophisticated agreements. Wallets are smart contracts that allow your funds to be controlled by multiple accounts. They can have an optional daily limit on withdrawals to increase security. Create your own smart contracts on the Agreements tab.
accounts.accountsDescription: Local Accounts are password protected keys that can hold iron. They are stored on this computer and you need your key file to access from somewhere else.

modal.deleteText:
Do you really want to delete this wallet contract? If you don't separately track it and its private key, you may not be able to find it on the blockchain and will lose access to any funds deposited

Type "delete" confirm the deletion.

backupWallet.title: Backup your wallet contract address!
backupWallet.description: Make sure to write down the wallet contract address:

modal.copyAddressWarning: Warning: Check you are sending to the right Address. Transfers cannot be refunded.

transactions.outOfGasDesc: The transaction didn't seem to have enough gas to execute.

error.noDataDeployed: No data is deployed on the contract address!
error.outOfGas: The transaction from __from__ to __to__ couldn't be successfully executed.

simple.title: Single owner account
simple.description: A simple contract without additional security measures.
simple.warning: Note: If your owner account is compromised, your wallet has no protection.

multisig.title: Multisignature wallet contract
multisig.description: A contract controlled by multiple accounts
multisig.text1: This is a joint account controlled by
multisig.text2: owners. You can send up to
multisig.text4: Any transaction over that daily limit requires the confirmation of

import.title: Import wallet
import.youreOwner: Your "__account__" account is an owner of this wallet contract.
import.watchOnly: You don't own the account, but you can add it as a "WATCH ONLY" account.
import.notWallet: This address has no wallet contract.

error.stubHasNoOrigWalletAddress: Your stub contract has no original account address set.  Please restart your App!
error.checkOwnerAddress: Please change the contract address __address__ to an account.

error.emptyWallet: The account you want to send from is empty.
error.notEnoughFunds: You don't have enough funds in the account.
error.noAmount: You didn't specify an amount to send.

texts.ownerPaysGas: Gas is paid by the owner of the wallet contract
texts.overDailyLimit: This amount is over the remaining daily limit of __limit__ (of __total__ per day), so you need __count__ other account to confirm.
texts.overDailyLimit_plural: This amount is over the remaining daily limit of __limit__ (of __total__ per day), so you need __count__ other accounts to confirm.
texts.underDailyLimit: This amount is under the remaining daily limit of __limit__ (of __total__ per day), means it will send immediately.
texts.sendFee: This is the most amount of money that might be used to process this transaction. Your transaction will be mined __timetext__.
texts.noCodeInRecipient: The recipient account is not a contract, so you can't execute anything. Put a contract address on the 'TO' field.
texts.addData: You can add extra data to send along with your transaction. If you don't know what this is then don't touch it or bad things may happen.
texts.dataNotExecutable: It seems this transaction will fail. If you submit it, it may consume all the gas you provide.
texts.cantEstimateGas: We can't estimate your gas usage properly, as you need at least 1 iron in your account.

timeTexts.0: in a few minutes or more

tokens.title: Custom Tokens
tokens.subTitle: Added tokens
tokens.description: Tokens are currencies and other fungibles built on the Ethereum platform. In order for accounts to watch for tokens and send them, you have to add their address to this list. You can create your own token by simply modifying this example of a custom token contract or learning more about Ethereum Tokens.
tokens.deleteToken: Do you want to remove the token __token__ from your list?

contracts.name: Name
contracts.noContract:
Use your Agreement source code here!

You may be Creative.
Otherwise, you can copy and paste it!

error.noDataProvided: No data found: select a contract from the 'select contract' menu
error.invalidAddress: This is not a valid address.
